meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ellen Mizio Matt Douma Amit Kurlekar Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6211.

div.div: First game consolation prizes sponsored. Sponsor's name appears on podiums under prize totals at conclusion of game. (Sponsorship does not appear on reruns.)

td.p: Ellen Mizio, a forensics researcher from Tampa, Florida
Matt Douma, a standardized test scorer from Minneapolis, Minnesota
Amit Kurlekar, an attorney from Oakland, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $16,801)

tr.td: NOTIONS
50 YEARS AGO--1961
ALL IN THE FAMILY
ALSO A ZODIAC SYMBOL
FORBES' RICHEST PEOPLE 2011
(Alex: We want you to name the show. We'll give you the...)
TV CATCHPHRASES

Matt

Amit

(including 2 DDs),

4 W
(including 1 DD)
